description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry Swirl Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry Swirl Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup caster sugar, plus 2 tbs caster sugar extra

recipeInstructions.text: Follow the directions for Basic vanilla ice-cream ( see recipe ) to Step 6. To make the raspberry swirl, heat 300g fresh or frozen raspberries, 2 tbs caster sugar and 1 tbs water in a saucepan over a low-medium heat, stirring often, or until raspberries soften and form a sauce. Reduce heat to low and cook for a further 5 minutes.

Remove from heat and strain in a sieve to remove seeds, if desired. Stir in 1 tbs vodka, if desired. Chill until cold. In a container, layer beaten ice-cream in Step 6 with dollops of raspberry sauce. Swirl through using a flat knife. Seal and freeze overnight or until firm.
